sentences: Bruce Mitchell (born 6 June 1940) is an English jazz drummer, who plays regularly with Vini Reilly in the Durutti Column.
Mitchell was born in the suburb of Didsbury, in the south of Manchester, on 6 June 1940.
He was in a Manchester trad band, around 1960, and during a time, he was a hippie.
Prior to 1974 he was in the group Greasy Bear.
In 1974 he joined comedy rock band Alberto y Lost Trios Paranoias; the band folded in 1982.
Mitchell joined The Durutti Column in 1981 for the album LC, and has managed the band.
